subject: p15185305
History: Evaluation of the patient after MVC with bilateral lower extremity edema.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was compared to. The Dobbhoff tube tip passes below the diaphragm. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is unchanged. There is unchanged appearance of left perihilar mass. Patient continues to be in mild interstitial edema. Small bilateral pleural effusions are most likely present. Overall no substantial change since the prior radiograph demonstrated.
